headline: AM Best Comments on Credit Ratings of Everest Group, Ltd. and Its Subsidiaries Following Recent Earnings Release
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., February 04, 2025--AM Best has commented that the Financial Strength Rating (FSR) of A+ (Superior) and the Long-Term Issuer Credit Ratings (Long-Term ICR) of "aa-" (Superior) of the operating subsidiaries of Everest Group, Ltd. (Bermuda) [NYSE: EG] (collectively referred to as Everest) remain unchanged following the recent earnings release and associated $1.7 billion of net reserve strengthening reported. Additionally, AM Best has commented that the Long-Term ICRs of "a-" (Excelle

headline: Earnings Coming In Better-Than-Expected As Peak Season Begins
summary: Q4 S&P 500 EPS growth expected to come in at 13.2%, the highest growth rate in three years. Read more here.
